languages.text: {n}Кибелла стоит неподвижно, в глубоком трансе, но при вашем приближении возвращается в реальность.{/n} "Каждый вздох и удар сердца приближал этот момент, Домин'{name}. Не колеблись — ступай во тьму, и позволь своей тени и щиту быть подле тебя".

{n}Kibellah stands motionless, deep in trance, but returns to reality the moment you approach.{/n} "Your every breath and heartbeat has been in anticipation of this moment, Domin'{name}. Do not hesitate. Step into the darkness and allow your shield and shadow to walk with you."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла стоит неподвижно, в глубоком трансе, но при вашем приближении возвращается в реальность.{/n} "Каждый вздох и удар сердца приближал этот момент, Домин'{name}. Не колеблись — ступай во тьму, и позволь своей тени и щиту быть подле тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah stands motionless, deep in trance, but returns to reality the moment you approach.{/n} "Your every breath and heartbeat has been in anticipation of this moment, Enim'{name}. Do not hesitate. Step into the darkness and allow your shield and shadow to walk with you."

{n}Kibellah stands motionless, deep in trance, but returns to reality the moment you approach.{/n} "Your every breath and heartbeat has been in anticipation of this moment, Domin'{name}. Do not hesitate. Step into the darkness and allow your shield and shadow to walk with you."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah está inmóvil, sumida en un trance, pero vuelve a la realidad en cuanto te acercas.{/n} «Cada uno de sus alientos y latidos l{mf|e|a} han conducido a este momento, Domin'{name}. No dude. Adéntrese en las tinieblas y permita a su escudo y sombra caminar a su lado».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah stands motionless, deep in trance, but returns to reality the moment you approach.{/n} "Your every breath and heartbeat has been in anticipation of this moment, Domin'{name}. Do not hesitate. Step into the darkness and allow your shield and shadow to walk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah está inmóvil, sumida en un trance, pero vuelve a la realidad en cuanto te acercas.{/n} «Cada uno de sus alientos y latidos l{mf|e|a} han conducido a este momento, Domin'{name}. No dude. Adéntrese en las tinieblas y permita a su escudo y sombra caminar a su lado».

languages.text: {n}キベラは恍惚とした表情で微動だにせず立ち尽くす。けれどあなたが近づいた瞬間、現実に立ち返った。{/n}「あなたの呼吸と鼓動はすべて、この瞬間を予期していたのね、ドミン・{name}。ためらわないで。暗闇に足を踏み入れ、盾と影があなたとともに歩むことを許可して」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah stands motionless, deep in trance, but returns to reality the moment you approach.{/n} "Your every breath and heartbeat has been in anticipation of this moment, Domin'{name}. Do not hesitate. Step into the darkness and allow your shield and shadow to walk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは恍惚とした表情で微動だにせず立ち尽くす。けれどあなたが近づいた瞬間、現実に立ち返った。{/n}「あなたの呼吸と鼓動はすべて、この瞬間を予期していたのね、エニム・{name}。ためらわないで。暗闇に足を踏み入れ、盾と影があなたとともに歩むことを許可して」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈一动不动站在原地，陷入了恍惚之中，但当你接近她时，她的意识又回到了现实世界。{/n}“你的每次呼吸，每次信条，都是在期待这一刻，秘者{name}。不要犹豫，步入黑暗之中吧，让你的坚盾和影子与你同行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah stands motionless, deep in trance, but returns to reality the moment you approach.{/n} "Your every breath and heartbeat has been in anticipation of this moment, Domin'{name}. Do not hesitate. Step into the darkness and allow your shield and shadow to walk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈一动不动站在原地，陷入了恍惚之中，但当你接近她时，她的意识又回到了现实世界。{/n}“你的每次呼吸，每次信条，都是在期待这一刻，秘者{name}。不要犹豫，步入黑暗之中吧，让你的坚盾和影子与你同行。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah steht in eine tiefe Trance versunken regungslos vor dir, kehrt aber in die Realität zurück, sobald du dich ihr näherst.{/n} "Jeder Eurer Atemzüge und Herzzschläge hat auf diesen Moment gewartet, Domin'{name}. Zögert nicht. Tretet in die Dunkelheit und lasst Euch von Eurem Schild und Schatten begleiten."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah stands motionless, deep in trance, but returns to reality the moment you approach.{/n} "Your every breath and heartbeat has been in anticipation of this moment, Domin'{name}. Do not hesitate. Step into the darkness and allow your shield and shadow to walk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah steht in eine tiefe Trance versunken regungslos vor dir, kehrt aber in die Realität zurück, sobald du dich ihr näherst.{/n} "Jeder Eurer Atemzüge und Herzzschläge hat auf diesen Moment gewartet, Domin'{name}. Zögert nicht. Tretet in die Dunkelheit und lasst Euch von Eurem Schild und Schatten begleiten."

languages.text: {n}Plongée dans un état de transe, Kibellah se tient immobile avant de revenir à la réalité à votre approche.{/n} « Chacune de vos inspirations et chacun de vos battements de cœur n'étaient que des préliminaires à cet instant fatidique, Domin'{name}. N'hésitez pas. Entrez dans les ténèbres et permettez à votre ombre et bouclier de vous accompagner. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah stands motionless, deep in trance, but returns to reality the moment you approach.{/n} "Your every breath and heartbeat has been in anticipation of this moment, Domin'{name}. Do not hesitate. Step into the darkness and allow your shield and shadow to walk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Plongée dans un état de transe, Kibellah se tient immobile avant de revenir à la réalité à votre approche.{/n} « Chacune de vos inspirations et chacun de vos battements de cœur n'étaient que des préliminaires à cet instant fatidique, Domin'{name}. N'hésitez pas. Entrez dans les ténèbres et permettez à votre ombre et bouclier de vous accompagner. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, derin trans hâlinde hareketsizce duruyor. Yaklaşmanla birlikte gerçekliğe geri dönüyor.{/n} "Aldığın her bir nefes ve kalbinin her bir atışı, tam bu anın beklentisiyle doluydu Domin'{name}. Tereddüt etme. Karanlığına adımını at. Bırak kalkanın ve gölgen sana bu yolda eşlik etsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah stands motionless, deep in trance, but returns to reality the moment you approach.{/n} "Your every breath and heartbeat has been in anticipation of this moment, Domin'{name}. Do not hesitate. Step into the darkness and allow your shield and shadow to walk with you."
